name: Make Burgers!🍔
description:
Have you ever made burgers? Yes? No? It doesn't matter! Now is the time!

Now you can try the newest game from BUG-Studio and Crescent Moon Games, Make Burgers!
Show what you can do by completing burger orders from buyers, while earning enough money to open new restaurants to get new buyers.
New restaurants means new customers who will want new kinds of burgers.
Earn points to become the best in the high score table.
Compete with players from all over the world!
Make burgers quickly and without don't make mistakes.. or you will fail!

FEATURES OF GAME
* Simple and addictive gameplay.
* 5 different restaurants.
* More than 70 customers with their personal tastes.
* Great soundtrack by HateBit! Turn it up!

Can you become a Burger Master? Download and start making burgers right now!
